### Premium Add-onsEnhance your event experience with these optional capabilities.

##### Virtual Production Suite

Create studio-quality video for live events, all from Bizzabo’s native easy-to-use platform. Features include interactive chat, Q&A, and the ability to seamlessly bring attendees “on-stage.”

##### Bizzabo Advanced Onsite

Deliver a seamless in-person experience with Bizzabo’s Onsite Command App, which supports custom badge printing,  quick check-in, session access, lead capture, and real-time data.

##### Martech and CRM integrations

Connect marketing platforms like Hubspot, Marketo, Salesforce MCAE (Pardot), Oracle Eloqua, and more to build omnichannel marketing journeys and custom reporting.

##### Sponsor portal

Manage sponsors at scale within a dedicated portal.

##### Speaker portal

Streamline speaker communications with automation and reminders. 

##### Custom-branded app

Keep attendees informed and boost engagement with a custom-branded event app.

##### Video on Demand

Extend the life of your content by enabling registrants to watch prerecorded content.

##### API access

Get access to Bizzabo’s open API to develop your own solutions and connectors.

##### Corporate IP address

Optimize email deliverability with a dedicated IP address.

##### Organizer SSO

Manage access according to organizer access control and security policies.

##### Attendee SSO

Create private events by gating event websites or registration through an Identity Provider (IdP).

##### Branding

Private-label public-facing assets, including the event website, emails, and virtual Venue.

#### Frequently asked questions

##### Q: Can I purchase Bizzabo for a single event?  

A: Bizzabo’s [Event Experience Operating System](https://www.bizzabo.com/event-management-software) is a robust platform for your entire event portfolio, from webinars, to field events, and multi-day conferences. Data shows that our customers are most successful when they use Bizzabo for all their events, which is why we require an annual subscription to use Bizzabo.  

##### Q: Can I purchase Klik Experiential without being an Event Experience OS customer?  

A: Yes, Bizzabo’s Klik smart wearables are compatible with third-party event management platforms and apps.  

[#### Learn More About Klik](https://www.bizzabo.com/event-management-software/klik-smart-event-badges)

##### Q: How much do Bizzabo’s professional services cost?  

A: Pricing is variable because each service is customized to the event’s unique size and scope. Please get in touch so that we can learn about your specific needs.  

[#### Learn More About Our Professional Services](https://www.bizzabo.com/event-management-software/professional-event-services)

##### Q: Will my attendees’ data be private and safe?  

A: Bizzabo’s [Event Experience OS](https://www.bizzabo.com/product) is built on top of enterprise-grade infrastructure with unmatched reliability, scalability, and security. We’ve invested in and maintained the highest security standards and industry best practices, including SOCII, ISO27001, GDPR, CCPA, and ADA compliance.  

[#### Learn More](https://www.bizzabo.com/legal/privacy-policy)
